Guards are found throughout the Desert Mining Camp, patrolling the inner camp and the underground mines.

The guards normally are not aggressive. However, inside the camp and mines, they are aggressive to players wearing any armour or weapons.

These guards all are equipped with Steel chainbody armour and what appear to be Steel round shields. The rest of their equipment varies. They may be bare-headed or wear leather, bronze or iron med helms. They also have varying amounts of facial and head hair. They may wield either machetes or what appear to be sabres.

Bones1Always620

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The guards replaced earlier NPCs called Rowdy Guards, who are still present in the game files.
  • One of the guards (brown hair) near the building in the north part of the mining camp tends to be aggressive compare to his counterparts, regardless if the player only wears Slave robes.

'''Guards''' are found throughout the [[Desert Mining Camp]], patrolling the inner camp and the underground mines.

The guards normally are not aggressive. However, inside the camp and mines, they are aggressive to players wearing any armour or weapons.

These guards all are equipped with [[Steel chainbody]] armour and what appear to be Steel round shields. The rest of their equipment varies. They may be bare-headed or wear leather, bronze or [[iron med helm]]s. They also have varying amounts of facial and head hair. They may wield either [[machete]]s or what appear to be [[sabre]]s.

==Trivia==
*The guards replaced earlier NPCs called [[Rowdy Guard]]s, who are still present in the game files.
*One of the guards (brown hair) near the building in the north part of the mining camp tends to be aggressive compare to his counterparts, regardless if the player only wears [[Slave robes]].
